title: Poverty rate of black families in the U.S. 1990 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of poor black families, containing a total of 29 data points.
Overall Percentage of poor black families has decreased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1993 and 1994.
Maximum Percentage of poor black families, about 31.3 was reported at Year 1993
Minimum Percentage of poor black families about 17.7 was reached at Year 2018
